column2: "Na wɔrekasa kyerɛ nkorɔfo no
column3: asɔfo nye asɔrfi safohen
column4: nye Sadusiifo no baa hɔn do
column6: "na ɔyɛɛ hɔn ehi dɛ wɔnam Jesus do reka ewufo mu soɛr ho asɛm."

column2: "Na wɔdze nsa suoo hɔn mu dze hɔn kesiee dɛ adze nkye: osiandɛ nna edu anafua."
"Na hɔn a wɔtsee asɛm no dodowara gyee dzii; na nyimpa no dodow bɛyɛɛ mpemenum."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ adze kyee no
column3: hɔn etsitsir nye mpanyimfo nye kyerɛwfo no behyiae wɔ Jerusalɛm
column9: nye dodowara a wofi sɔfopanyin ebusua mu."

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn begyinaa finimfin bisaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Ebɛn tum anaadɛ ebɛn dzin mu na hom yɛɛ yi?"

column2: "Nna Peter a Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ahyɛ no ma no see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ɔman mu etsitsir
column6: "sɛ dza wɔrepɛnsa hɛn mu ndɛ wɔ yie a wɔayɛ ama ɔyarfo yi ho
column8: Ɔnam ebɛnadze do na wɔagye no nkwa a;"

column2: "hom nyina nye Israelman nyina nhu dɛ Nazarɛtnyi Jesus Kraest a hom bɔɔ no mbeamudua mu na Nyankopɔn nyaan no fii ewufo mu no
column3: ne dzin mu a; ɔno no mu na oyi no ho asan gyina hom enyim ha yi."

column2: "Ɔno nye ɔbo a hom adantofo emmbu no bi
column3: na wɔayɛ no kutuwdo bo."

column2: "Na nkwagye nnyi obiara so mu: eso dzin fofor biara nnyi wi yi ase a wɔdze ama wɔ nyimpa mu a otwar dɛ wɔgye hɛn nkwa wɔ mu."
"Na wohun Peter nye John hɔn ndam no
column3: na wɔtsee ase dɛ wɔyɛ nyimpa a wonnsuaa nwoma na wɔyɛ ntsetsekwaa no
column4: ɔyɛɛ hɔn nwanwa; na wohun dɛ wɔnye Jesus anantsew pɛn."

column2: "Na wɔhwɛɛ nyimpa a wɔasa no yarba no a ɔnye hɔn gyina hɔ no
column3: woenntum annka hwee enntsia hɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ womfi bagua mu hɔ nkɔ nkyɛn
column3: na wotuu hɔn mu egyina
column6: Yɛnyɛ nyimpa yi dɛn? Wɔnam hɔn do ayɛ asɛnkyerɛdze a ɔyɛ nwanwa
column7: a ada edzi ama hɔn a wɔtse Jerusalɛm nyina

column2: "Na mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma ɔnnkɛda ho atahye ɔman mu no
column3: hom mma yempuw hɔn dɛ mma wɔnnka dzin yi ho asɛm nnkyerɛ nyimpa biara bio."

column2: "Na wɔfrɛɛ hɔn hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ mma wɔnnkasa
column3: eso mma wɔnnkyerɛkyerɛ wɔ Jesus dzin mu koraa."

column2: "Na Peter nye John buae see hɔn dɛ
column3: Sɛ ɔtsen wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim dɛ yetsie hom kyɛn Nyankopɔn a

column2: "na hɛn dze
column3: yerunntum gyedɛ yɛka dza yeehu na yɛatse."

column2: "Na hɔn dze
column3: wopupuuw hɔn bio no
column5: na woennhu mbrɛ wɔbɛyɛ atsea hɔn wɔ ɔman no ntsi
column6: osiandɛ hɔn nyina hyɛɛ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam wɔ dza esi no ho."

column2: "Nna nyimpa no a wɔyɛɛ dɛm ayarsa asɛnkyerɛdze yi wɔ no do no
column3: edzi bɔbor mfe eduanan."

column2: "Na wogyaa hɔn no
column3: wɔbaa hɔn mfɛfo nkyɛn
column4: na wɔbɛkaa dza asɔfompanyin nye mpanyimfo no see hɔn nyina kyerɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na wɔtsee no
column3: wɔyɛɛ anokor maa hɔn ndze do maa Nyankopɔn see dɛ
column5: ɔwo a eyɛɛ ɔsor nye asaase nye po nye no mu dza ɔwɔ mu nyina"

column2: "a enam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn do kae wɔ w’akowaa David anomu dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na amanaman reyɛ gyigyeegye
column4: Na amanamamfo rususu adze gyangyan yi?"

column2: "Asaase do ahemfo baa mpasuar
column3: Etsitsir boaa ano tsiaa Ewuradze nye ne Kraest no:"

column2: "ampaara w’Akowaa Krɔnkrɔn Jesus a asera no no
column3: na Herod nye Pontius Pilate nye amanamamfo nye Israelmba hyiae tsiaa no

column2: "dɛ wɔrebɛyɛ dza wo nsa nye w’apam hyɛe too hɔ dɛ onsi no nyina."
"Na afei
column3: Ewuradze
column5: na ma wo nkowaa mfa ndamyɛ nyina nka w’asɛm
column8: ma wɔnam w’Akowaa Krɔnkrɔn Jesus ne dzin do aayɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze."

column2: "Na wowiee nkotoserɛ mpaabɔ no
column3: beebi mbrɛ woehyia hɔ no wosowee
column4: na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn hyɛɛ hɔn nyina ma
column5: na wɔdze ndam kaa Nyankopɔn asɛm no."

column2: "Na nyimpadodow a wɔgyee dzii no
column3: yɛɛ akoma kor
column4: nye ɔkra kor; na hɔn mu biara annse dɛ ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ yɛ nankasa nedze
column5: na ne nyina yɛɛ hɔn kwasafodze."

column2: "Na ahoɔdzen kɛse na asomafo no dze gyee Jesus no wunyan ho dase
column3: na adom kɛse baa hɔn nyina do."

column2: "Eso obiara nnyi hɔn mu a ohiaa no
column3: na hɔn a wɔwɔ nsaase nye adan tontɔnee
column4: na wɔdze dza wɔtɔnee ne tsibo bae
column7: na wɔkyɛe maa obiara dɛ mbrɛ ohia no."

column2: "Na Josef a asomafo no too no Barnabas (ne nkyerɛase nye dɛ Awerɛkyekyer Ba no) a ɔyɛ Levinyi a ofi Siprusman mu no
column6: na ɔdze ne sika bae boguu asomafo no ananadze."
